amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to prohibit the use of funds for military recruitment via Twitch and e-sports activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to prohibit the use of funds for military recruitment via Twitch and e-sports activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 126 - 292 (Roll no. 173).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.
